amendment.description: To strengthen the Special Inspector General for Iraq Reconstruction.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4256 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4256 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S5914-5916; text: CR S5914) To strengthen the Special Inspector General for Iraq Reconstruction.
